attributes.action: Exchange hard-working illegal immigrants for the willfully unemployed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every single illegal immigrant who's been working regularly in this country should be given immediate citizenship and a single wilfully unemployed person should be sent back to the immigrant's country of origin thereby ceasing to be a 'drain' on the tax payer.
The net result: 
1) the new citizen continues to gain a living in the country of their choice (i.e. England) whilst now paying taxes.
2) the unemployed have more incentive to find employment 
3) Anyone *still* willing to find employment gets deported.

It's a win-win solution.
